text: Vspomni naryadu s etimi istoriyami (o Mukhammad!) takzhe istoriyu Maryam, kotoraya blyula tselomudriye, i My vdokhnuli v neyo ot Nashego dukha, i ona ponesla bez supruga, i yeyo syn byl rozhdon bez ottsa. Ona i yeyo syn stali yavnym znameniyem Nashego mogushchestva v izmenenii svyazey i prichin (sozdaniya). Poistine, My Vsemogushchi i Nasha moshch' okhvatyvayet vso
